snippet: As the manhunt for the former Los Angeles police officer Christopher Dorner drew to a close, a news crew recorded video of a gun battle between officers and the suspect that took place in front of them.
abstract: As the manhunt for the former Los Angeles police officer Christopher Dorner drew to a close, a news crew recorded video of a gun battle between officers and the suspect that took place in front of them.

headline.main: Video of California Shootout Is Captured by CBS News Crew
